title: Central Business District Tower
description: Design and engineering of a 25-story commercial complex featuring sustainable building practices and modern structural systems. This landmark project showcases innovative engineering solutions with LEED certification standards.
shortDescription: A 25-story commercial complex with sustainable building practices and LEED certification.

title: Northern Highway Expansion
description: Comprehensive highway expansion project including bridge construction, drainage systems, and traffic management solutions. The project improved connectivity across the region with state-of-the-art infrastructure.
shortDescription: Highway expansion with bridge construction and advanced traffic management systems.

title: Water Treatment Facility
description: State-of-the-art water treatment plant design serving 500,000+ residents with advanced filtration and distribution systems. This facility ensures clean, safe water supply with sustainable practices.
shortDescription: Modern water treatment plant serving 500,000+ residents with advanced filtration systems.

title: Suspension Bridge Project
description: Engineering and design of a 450-meter suspension bridge spanning a major river. The project utilized advanced materials and seismic-resistant design principles.
shortDescription: 450-meter suspension bridge with seismic-resistant design spanning a major river.

title: Industrial Complex Development
description: Complete engineering services for a 50-hectare industrial complex including structural design, utilities, and infrastructure planning. The project supports regional economic development.
shortDescription: 50-hectare industrial complex with comprehensive engineering services and infrastructure planning.

title: Urban Rail Transit System
description: Comprehensive design and engineering for a modern urban rail transit system including stations, tracks, and signaling systems. This project transforms public transportation in the city.
shortDescription: Modern urban rail transit system with stations, tracks, and advanced signaling systems.

title: Coastal Highway Bridge Complex
description: Design and construction of a 1.2km multi-span bridge complex connecting coastal regions. Features advanced seismic resistance and sustainable materials, serving as a critical transportation link.
shortDescription: 1.2km multi-span bridge complex with seismic resistance connecting coastal regions.

title: Smart City Infrastructure Network
description: Comprehensive engineering design for smart city infrastructure including intelligent traffic systems, smart lighting, and integrated utility networks. This project sets the foundation for future urban development.
shortDescription: Smart city infrastructure with intelligent traffic systems and integrated utility networks.

title: Residential Complex Development
description: Complete structural engineering and design for a 500-unit residential complex featuring sustainable building practices, green spaces, and modern amenities. The project includes multi-story buildings with earthquake-resistant design.
shortDescription: 500-unit residential complex with sustainable practices and earthquake-resistant design.

title: Wastewater Treatment Plant
description: State-of-the-art wastewater treatment facility with capacity for 300,000 residents. Features advanced biological treatment processes, energy recovery systems, and environmental compliance measures.
shortDescription: Wastewater treatment facility serving 300,000 residents with energy recovery systems.

title: Airport Terminal Expansion
description: Engineering design for major airport terminal expansion including structural modifications, new boarding gates, and enhanced passenger facilities. The project improves capacity by 40% while maintaining operations.
shortDescription: Airport terminal expansion increasing capacity by 40% with enhanced passenger facilities.

title: Hydroelectric Power Plant
description: Comprehensive engineering services for a 50MW hydroelectric power plant including dam design, turbine installation, and power transmission infrastructure. This renewable energy project serves multiple regions.
shortDescription: 50MW hydroelectric power plant with dam design and power transmission infrastructure.

title: Shopping Mall Complex
description: Complete structural and MEP engineering for a 3-story shopping mall with 200+ retail units, parking facilities, and entertainment areas. Features modern architectural design with sustainable building systems.
shortDescription: 3-story shopping mall with 200+ retail units and sustainable building systems.

title: Port Infrastructure Upgrade
description: Major port infrastructure upgrade including new berths, cargo handling facilities, and container terminal expansion. The project enhances port capacity and efficiency for international trade.
shortDescription: Port infrastructure upgrade with new berths and expanded container terminal capacity.

title: Hospital Complex Design
description: Comprehensive engineering design for a 300-bed hospital complex including specialized medical facilities, emergency services, and support infrastructure. Features advanced HVAC and medical gas systems.
shortDescription: 300-bed hospital complex with specialized medical facilities and advanced HVAC systems.

title: Rural Road Network Development
description: Design and construction supervision for 200km rural road network connecting remote communities. Includes drainage systems, bridges, and road safety features to improve accessibility and economic opportunities.
shortDescription: 200km rural road network with drainage systems and bridges connecting remote communities.

title: Water Distribution Network
description: Comprehensive water distribution network design covering 150km of pipelines, pumping stations, and storage facilities. This project provides reliable water supply to underserved communities.
shortDescription: 150km water distribution network with pumping stations serving underserved communities.

title: Sports Complex Stadium
description: Engineering design for a 20,000-seat multi-purpose sports stadium with modern facilities, VIP areas, and comprehensive infrastructure. Features innovative structural design for optimal viewing experience.
shortDescription: 20,000-seat multi-purpose sports stadium with modern facilities and VIP areas.
